requirement.topic: XmlBlaster delivers the sender name of a message in the qos argument
requirement.description: When a client receives an update message, he can retrieve the sender of the message in the qos argument of the update with the <sender> tag. The sender is the unique login name of the publisher. This works with PtP and with Pub/Sub style.
requirement.example: <qos> <sender> <!-- The publisher login name of this message --> Phillipe </sender> </qos>
requirement.author: ruff@swand.lake.de
